fields.name: Everhart
fields.bio: Everhart Schippers combines his expertise as a physiotherapist with his training in Reiki to create a powerful blend of physical and energetic healing. His treatments integrate body alignment and energy clearing, guiding clients toward deep restoration and long-term balance.

fields.name: Saskia
fields.bio: Saskia van der Hoeven is a gentle and intuitive practitioner of reflexology and mindfulness coaching. Her sessions combine foot therapy with breathwork to release emotional blockages and awaken spiritual clarity in her clients.

fields.name: Vromme
fields.bio: Vromme Goossens holds a dual background in psychology and Ayurvedic therapies. Her practice draws on emotional wellness and traditional Eastern wisdom. She offers guided meditation sessions and energy balancing treatments to help clients reconnect with their inner calm and strength.

fields.name: Wit
fields.bio: Wit van der Velden is a certified naturopath and nutrition therapist who believes in the healing power of nature and food. He specializes in plant-based therapies, offering customized herbal protocols and nutritional guidance to support physical vitality and balance.
